page.title: 04 INTERVIEWS.
page.content:
Farmer Sears explained that the farm was over 300 years old and was part of Lord Chesham's estate.He farmed 20 beef cattle(Aberdeen Angus) on 40 acres.He has 3 sons to help and had farmed since 1952.It was felt that farming was becoming less profitable as too much food was being produced.
P.C. JACOBS P.C. Jacobs works at Amersham Police Station."As we come on duty we are briefed and assigned duties for the day.Most constables and officers do special duties.The station operates mainly from the ground floor.Below are the cells and the interview room.When someone is arrested we remove objects which could be used against officers.I am part of the police liason dept which plans to unite the police & public.
